pages.title: How to craft your first piece.
pages.text: After salvaging a few pieces of gear, you should have some materials left over. Forge them into appropriate parts to craft your gear. leather for leather armor and cloth for cloth armor.
Ores allow you to craft weapons, jewelry and plate armor
Cloth and Leather for appropriate armors.
Wands are required for casting many spells, so you probably want to craft them first.

pages.title: Note
pages.text: Every recipe follows a predictable formula. Higher level items require higher tier materials. Special types of same item type require appropriate essences. For example a healing scepter requires essence of life. Fill out the empty spots of the 3x3 crafting grid with the essence.
